channel.title: Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once on Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once - Get Uptime As An API Service
channel.description: Recent content in Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once on Ping Everything Everywhere All At Once - Get Uptime As An API Service

item.title: Supported Servers
item.description: Singapore Japan Germany Finland Oregon, US New York, US and many more to come

item.title: Usage
item.description: To use, you will make a curl to our API server and specify a callback_url which you will receive notifications on the ping results at. curl -X POST \ -H "Authorization: Bearer <token> \ https://api.peeaao.com/ping \ -d target=https://url \ -d interval=15s \ -d count=100 \ -d locations=singapore \ -d callback_url=https://callback_url \ -d expected_code=301 Parameter Description Optional Single Request Interval/Callback target URL to target (in http/https) - X X interval - Yes - X callback_url - Yes - X locations Ping from locations (comma-delimited) Yes X X count - - - X expected_code - - X X âœ’ Single Request In this mode, you will get the result in the same request.

item.title: Private Beta is Open
item.description: We are currently in private beta. To register your interest, please leave your email at the following link: https://forms.gle/ZkAzxLVnVDftLNLn7
